sections.title: Alcohol and the Brain
sections.content: Alcohol can affect various areas of the brain including cerebellum ...

sections.title: What does Cerebellum do?
sections.content: Cerebellum is one of the major controlling areas in terms of motor function: that means moving our bodies and keeping our balance ...
